languages.text: {n}Капеллан смотрит на вас не слишком приязненно, но кивает.{/n} "Вы — Вольный Торговец, это ваше право. Хотите оспорить завещание? Назначить своей волей другого наследника? Не думаю, что даже представители {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g} решатся вам возражать".

{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан смотрит на вас не слишком приязненно, но кивает.{/n} "Вы — Вольный Торговец, это ваше право. Хотите оспорить завещание? Назначить своей волей другого наследника? Не думаю, что даже представители {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g} решатся вам возражать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, this is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir by your own will? I don't think even the Administratum would dare to object."

{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, this is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir by your own will? I don't think even the Administratum would dare to object."

{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the Administratum would dare to object."

{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the Administratum would dare to object."

{n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."

languages.text: {n}牧师用不太友好的眼神看着你，但还是点了点头。{/n}“你是行商浪人，你有这个权利。你想对遗嘱提出质疑吗？还是想以你自己的名义，指定另一位继承人？我猜就算是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}，也不敢反对你的决定。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师用不太友好的眼神看着你，但还是点了点头。{/n}“你是行商浪人，你有这个权利。你想对遗嘱提出质疑吗？还是想以你自己的名义，指定另一位继承人？我猜就算是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}，也不敢反对你的决定。”

languages.text: {n}Capellán te lanza una mirada hostil, pero asiente.{/n} «Como Comerciante Independiente, tiene ese derecho. ¿Quiere cuestionar el testamento? ¿Nombrar otro heredero bajo su propia autoridad? No creo que ni el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} se atreva a objetar».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán te lanza una mirada hostil, pero asiente.{/n} «Como Comerciante Independiente, tiene ese derecho. ¿Quiere cuestionar el testamento? ¿Nombrar otro heredero bajo su propia autoridad? No creo que ni el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} se atreva a objetar».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は友好的とはいいがたい表情を見せたが、うなずいた。{/n}「あなたは自由開拓者ですからこの件について発言する権利があります。遺言に疑問を呈したいのでしょうか？自らの権限で別の相続人を指名しますか？{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}でさえ、あなたには反対しないでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は友好的とはいいがたい表情を見せたが、うなずいた。{/n}「あなたは自由開拓者ですからこの件について発言する権利があります。遺言に疑問を呈したいのでしょうか？自らの権限で別の相続人を指名しますか？{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}でさえ、あなたには反対しないでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester wirft dir einen unfreundlichen Blick zu, nickt aber.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} und habt dazu das Recht. Wollt Ihr das Testament anfechten? Einen anderen Erben nach Eurem Willen bestimmen? Ich denke, nicht einmal das {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} würde es wagen, Einspruch einzulegen."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester wirft dir einen unfreundlichen Blick zu, nickt aber.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} und habt dazu das Recht. Wollt Ihr das Testament anfechten? Einen anderen Erben nach Eurem Willen bestimmen? Ich denke, nicht einmal das {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} würde es wagen, Einspruch einzulegen."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain vous lance un regard hostile, mais se contente de hocher la tête.{/n} « En tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, c'est votre droit. Vous souhaitez remettre le testament en question ? Vous servir de votre autorité pour nommer un nouvel héritier ? Eh bien, faites. Je doute que même l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} ose s'y opposer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain vous lance un regard hostile, mais se contente de hocher la tête.{/n} « En tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, c'est votre droit. Vous souhaitez remettre le testament en question ? Vous servir de votre autorité pour nommer un nouvel héritier ? Eh bien, faites. Je doute que même l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} ose s'y opposer. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz sana pek dostane olmayan bir bakış atsa da başını sallıyor.{/n} "Siz Hür Tacir'siniz, hakkınızdır. İster vasiyeti sorgulayın, isterseniz de otoritenizi konuşturup başka bir vâris belirleyin. Size {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} bile itiraz edemez."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain gives you a less than friendly look, but nods.{/n} "You're a Rogue Trader, it is your right. You want to call the will into question? Name another heir on your own authority? I don't think even the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} would dare to object."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz sana pek de dostane olmayan bir bakış atıyor ama başını sallıyor.{/n} "Siz Hür Tacir'siniz, bu sizin hakkınızdır. Vasiyeti sorgulamak mı istersiniz? Otoritenizi başka bir vâris belirlemek için kullanmak mı istersiniz? Size {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} bile karşı koyamaz."
